thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Where to Find the Next Big Telecom Deal

author: Stephen Wilmot
title: Where to Find the Next Big Telecom Deal
text:
The deal action in the cable and wireless industry has shifted across the Atlantic to Europe. But the best way for investors to play it could be a company listed in New York: John Malone’s Liberty Global.

As investors speculated about a great American “game of phones” last year, deal activity in the European industry reached its lowest ebb in more than a decade. This year could be different: Earlier this month, mobile giant Vodafone said it was in “early stage discussions” to acquire “certain overlapping continental European...
